headline: Halcyon Appoints Veteran Security Leader Tony Spinelli as Field CISO, Strengthening Enterprise Resilience Against Ransomware
summary: Halcyon, the leading anti-ransomware solution provider, today announced the appointment of Tony Spinelli as Vice President, Field Chief Information Security Officer (Field CISO). With more than three decades of global cybersecurity and technology leadership, Spinelli will help organizations strengthen resilience against ransomware, working directly with CISOs to defeat the most pressing cyber threat to businesses today.
